section.title: TaskAPI.h
section.programlisting: 1 // Fill out your copyright notice in the Description page of Project Settings. 2 3 #pragma once 4 5 #include "CoreMinimal.h" 6 #include "Blueprint/UserWidget.h" 7 #include "WebBrowser.h" 8 #include "TaskAPI.generated.h" 9 13 UCLASS() 14 class UTaskAPI : public UUserWidget 15 { 16 GENERATED_BODY() 17 18 public: 19 UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "TaskAPI") 20 void SetBrowserURL(const FString& Endpoint); 21 22 // Pointer to the Web Browser widget 23 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, meta = (BindWidget), Category = "Calendar Properties") 24 UWebBrowser* WebBrowserWidget; 25 26 };
